title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument: Publications
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Publications            Publications        The Official Park Brochure and Newspaper: The official park brochure, which you will receive when you arrive at the Kris Eggle Visitor Center, includes a narrative of the monument's history, trail descriptions, and a map.  The newspaper also provides a trail guide and a map, but features more stories about history, science and current research.  Download the newspaper or the official map by clicking the links below. If you need additional information to help plan your visit, please contact the visitor center with your request.  Park Newspaper Park Map Detail Map (Campground Area)  Planning Your Visit:   English Deutsch Francais Espanol  Plant Information:   Cactus Checklist Plant Checklist Organ Pipe Cacti- Our Namesake Cactus Growth of a Saguaro Cactus Organ Pipe and Saguaro Cactus (Deutsch)  Animal Information    Snakes  Endangered Species Bird List  Wilderness:    Wild Matters: The Organ Pipe Cactus Wilderness  Accessibility:    Planning Your Accessible Visit  Other Publications:    Guide to Hiking Trails Guide to Hiking Trails- Deutsch Nature Trail Guide- Espanol Nature Trail Guide- Deutsch Bicycle Use Desert Safety
